channel.title: Code help please
channel.description:
how would i change it into gold instead of arrows?
[code]case 4463: // I Loot I TheifStall2("table", "You steal 25k arrows!", 1, 2500*playerLevel[17], Item.randompot(), 25000, 53, 0x340); break;[/code]
